info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59752
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59752
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36574
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 36574
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.alwaysdata.com. hostmaster.alwaysdata.com. 1712067742 3600 900 1209600 300

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 31181
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 31181
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ~all"
mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr.	1	IN	TXT	"brevo-code:c4cb300d85243bd4de8c227d75d79d7d"

info.name: DOM EventListener - Cross-Site Scripting
author: yavolo
dwisiswant0
info.description: EventListener contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability via the document object model (DOM). An attacker can execute arbitrary script which can then allow theft of cookie-based authentication credentials and launch of  other attacks.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: Cookies without HttpOnly or Secure attribute - Detect
author: princechaddha
mr.bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only
info.impact: Lack of HttpOnly flag on cookies increases the risk of client-side attacks, compromising user session security and data privacy.
info.remediation: Ensure that all cookies are set with the HttpOnly attribute to prevent client-side access.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden Connection: close Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Date: Sun, 14 Apr 2024 05:48:28 GMT Referrer-Policy: same-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: origin, Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Request-Id: 47fdb1fa-24c6-4cb4-b432-4f19f0e60a4e 403 Forbidden

Interdit (403)

La vérification CSRF a échoué. La requête a été interrompue.

Vous voyez ce message parce que ce site HTTPS exige que le navigateur web envoie un en-tête « Referer », ce qu’il n'a pas fait. Cet en-tête est exigé pour des raisons de sécurité, afin de s’assurer que le navigateur n’ait pas été piraté par un intervenant externe.

Si vous avez désactivé l’envoi des en-têtes « Referer » par votre navigateur, veuillez les réactiver, au moins pour ce site ou pour les connexions HTTPS, ou encore pour les requêtes de même origine (« same-origin »).

Si vous utilisez la balise <meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer"> ou que vous incluez l’en-tête « Referrer-Policy: no-referrer », il est préférable de les enlever. La protection CSRF exige que l’en-tête ``Referer`` effectue un contrôle de référant strict. Si vous vous souciez de la confidentialité, utilisez des alternatives comme <a rel="noreferrer" …> pour les liens vers des sites tiers.

Des informations plus détaillées sont affichées lorsque la variable DEBUG vaut True.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://mondiagartif.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
